amendment.description: To expand reimbursement for travel expenses of covered beneficiaries of CHAMPUS for specialty care in order to cover specialized dental care.

vote.text: Amendment SA 739 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 739 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Domenici. (consideration: CR S6839; text: CR S6839) To expand reimbursement for travel expenses of covered beneficiaries of CHAMPUS for specialty care in order to cover specialized dental care.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 739 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 739 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Domenici.
